summary: This code imports necessary modules, sets a template path, creates an environment with Jinja2's FileSystemLoader, retrieves the template, renders it with test data, and logs the resulting script using logger_print.

details.comment: This code imports necessary modules, sets a template path, creates an environment with Jinja2's FileSystemLoader, retrieves the template, renders it with test data, and logs the resulting script using logger_print.
details.content:
from log_utils import logger_print
template_path = "macro_test.j2"
from jinja2 import Environment, FileSystemLoader
env = Environment(loader=FileSystemLoader("./"))
tpl = env.get_template(template_path)
script = tpl.render(test="test_string")
logger_print(script)
